item.title: ‘Queer Eye’ Star Jeremiah Brent Calls His Crate & Barrel Capsule a “Return to Heirloom”
item.description: The celebrity interior designer speaks with The Hollywood Reporter about his top decorating tips and exclusive new collection: “Every little detail’s been thought about.”

item.title: Bobby Berk Says Netflix Could’ve Gave Him a “Heads-Up” ‘Queer Eye’ Was Ending Before His New HGTV Show Reveal
item.description: “This was planned. Show announcements don’t happen on a whim,” the interior designer said when addressing criticism of the timing of the announcement.
